name: Bee life simulator
description:
In the game you have to develop the life of bees, build hives, grow flowers, make a profit

I need ratings, tips on the type that can be added to the game

This is my first game and I am now at the moment of realizing whether I will continue to develop in this topic, it is interesting to me, but I love the process itself, and often I have no ideas and I do not know what I can implement
